com.sindice
Class Sindice

java.lang.Object
  com.sindice.Sindice

public class Sindice
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the main facade towards the Sindice.com Web API.

Author:
Milan Stankovic (milstan@gmail.com)

Constructor Detail

Sindice

public Sindice()
Method Detail

advancedSearch

public SearchResults advancedSearch(java.lang.String property,
                                    java.lang.String value)
                             throws SindiceException
Method for performing advanced search. It finds all the documents containing the specified pair. Returns a page of results in the form of a SearchResults object. For navigating through pages you can use the nextPage() and previousPage() methods of the SearchResults class. SearchResults object is in fact a list of SearchResult objects. First page of results is given by default. Results are ordered by date.

Parameters:
property - - the desired property
value - - the desired value
Returns:
SearchResults object, first page of results is returned by default. Results are ordered by date.
Throws:
SindiceException - if something goes wrong while contacting Sindice.com and processing its output

advancedSearch

public SearchResults advancedSearch(java.lang.String property,
                                    java.lang.String value,
                                    boolean sortByDate)
                             throws SindiceException
Method for performing advanced search. It finds all the documents containing the specified pair. Returns a page of results in the form of a SearchResults object. For navigating through pages you can use the nextPage() and previousPage() methods of the SearchResults class. SearchResults object is in fact a list of SearchResults objects. First page of results is returned by default.

Parameters:
property - - the desired property
value - - the desired value
sortByDate - - true or false depending on the desire to sort results by date
Returns:
SearchResults object, First page of results is returned by default.
Throws:
SindiceException - if something goes wrong while contacting Sindice.com and processing its output

termSearch

public SearchResults termSearch(java.lang.String term)
                         throws SindiceException
Method for performing term search. Returns all the documents containing the specified term. Returns a page of results in the form of a SearchResults object. For navigating through pages you can use the nextPage() and previousPage() methods of the SearchResults class. SearchResults object is in fact a list of SearchResults objects. Search results are ordered by date, and the first page of results is provided first by default.

Parameters:
term - - the search term
Returns:
SearchResults object, first page of search, with results ordered by date is provided by default
Throws:
SindiceException - if something goes wrong while contacting Sindice.com and processing its output

termSearch

public SearchResults termSearch(java.lang.String term,
                                boolean sortByDate)
                         throws SindiceException
Method for performing term search. Returns all the documents containing the specified term. Returns a page of results in the form of a SearchResults object. For navigating through pages you can use the nextPage() and previousPage() methods of the SearchResults class. SearchResults object is in fact a list of objects. First page of results is provided first by default.

Parameters:
term - - the search term
sortByDate - - true or false depending of the desire to sort results by date
Returns:
SearchResults object, first page of search is provided by default
Throws:
SindiceException - if something goes wrong while contacting Sindice.com and processing its output

termSearch

public SearchResults termSearch(java.lang.String term,
                                boolean sortByDate,
                                int page)
                         throws SindiceException
Method for performing term search. Returns all the documents containing the specified term. Returns a page of results in the form of a SearchResults object. For navigating through pages you can use the nextPage() and previousPage() methods of the SearchResults class. SearchResults object is in fact a list of SreachResult objects.

Parameters:
term - - the search term
sortByDate - - true or false depending if you want to order search results by date
page - - the desired page of search results
Returns:
SearchResults object
Throws:
SindiceException - if something goes wrong while contacting Sindice.com and processing its output

cacheQuery

public CacheResult cacheQuery(CacheQuery query)
                       throws SindiceException
Method for cache querying. Returns the the result matching the query parameter.

Parameters:
query - the query to be submitted to the cache.
Returns:
the query result.
Throws:
SindiceException - if an error occurs during the cache quering.
